author: Elv1s
title: For small children...
review: My aunt got this for me two years ago, I tried it on, it was a little small, as I have grown older, it got smaller on me. I now use it for transporting my old 1970's Lego parts around or to carry snacks if my marching band goes to cedar point. If you have a child who is 6-10 years old, then this backpack is great for them, just not for me.
